<p><iframe src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/poWFzY6cTW0" frameborder="0" width="520" height="294"></iframe></p>
<p>Freshman <a href="http://www.pennathletics.com/ViewArticle.dbml?SPSID=10659&amp;SPID=610&amp;DB_LANG=C&amp;DB_OEM_ID=1700&amp;ATCLID=205239572&amp;Q_SEASON=2011" target="_blank">Louis Lombardi</a>Â <a href="http://underthebutton.com/2011/06/penn-has-a-rapping-problem/" target="_blank">frat</a>-<a href="http://underthebutton.com/2011/06/rossman-rocks-it-out/" target="_blank">raps</a>, repeats: &#8220;Summertime and I&#8217;m chilling real fly/Brew in my hand, blue fuckin&#8217; skies/Staying up late, midnight munchies/Don&#8217;t forget about the morning, don&#8217;t fuckin&#8217; judge me.&#8221;</p>
<p>We have reached a new low point in Western civilization. In this <em>B</em><em>urrito ergo sum </em>world, <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2012_phenomenon" target="_blank">2012</a> is starting to look pretty nice.</p>
